channel.title: [Hyperion] Compiler doesn't change anything
channel.description:
Ok, so my compiler says that it compiled and theres no errors or anything, but nothing is changed when I restart the server.
This is the code: [code]@echo off java -jar lib/javac++.jar src lib bin pause[/code]
Does anyone know what's wrong? And if not, does anyone have a better compiler that they can post here?
Thanks.

item.title: [Hyperion] Compiler doesn't change anything
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

this has build and is for PI, i never heard of hyperion… sadly… but here

@echo off :build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause goto :build

Read full topic
